year in review 2023

2
0
2
3

As the curtain draws to a close on 2023, let's look at the year as it unfolded. I moved to Los Angeles, designed some exciting new filmmaking software, and earned my first film credit! I participated in multiple industry events, deepening existing skills and acquiring some new ones. Launched a design inspiration library and took some amazing photos during my travels.

Knowledge.Knowledge.Knowledge.

Attended several industry events this year, soaking up of new things along the way.

From 100 years to my first! This year I celebrated the 100th anniversary of the Walt Disney Animation Studios. Received my first film credit with the release of Wish. If you haven't already, go out and watch Wish! Give a shout out when you see my name in the credits.

It's time to bid farewell to 2023. Another year of wonderful experiences and happiness. As the new year starts, I wish you all the success and joy. Here is to all the beautiful memories of 2023 and to the next year full of laughter and unforgettable adventures.
